Name: treatment of tallow to esterquat | esterquat | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/202:Manufacture of other chemical products/2023:Manufacture of soap and detergents, cleaning and polishing preparations, pe
Description: Quaternary ammonium compounds are obtained by alkylisation of tertiary amines. For esterquat (cationic tensids) at least one ot the alkyl residues must be longer.;For this dataset, representing typical European production mix in the mid 90s, the cationic tensides are produced by esterification of triethanolamines and subsequent quaternation with dimethylsulphate. Isopropanol is used as solvent. Fatty acids used for the esterification step are from tallow.
